adDetails: I am piano teacher for over 17 years specializing in beginners. My teaching method is tailored to each student's learning style, thus making each lesson effective and appreciated. Each lesson is typically half an hour once a week but could be more depending on student's attention span. I go to your homes at your convenient time. I also go to the cities of Rohnert Park/Cotati, Santa Rosa and Petaluma. I also do lessons at my home in Santa Rosa. Pls call me at show contact info for more details.
